duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage tax activities for clients, ensuring quality deliverables on time and within budget.
Develop and manage client relationships and engagement, ensuring client satisfaction and communication upward.
Serve as an advisor and mentor to employees, providing guidance and on-the-job training.
Articulate client issues and opportunities in a non-technical manner to the client service team and clients.
Develop specialized expertise in one or more tax subject matter areas.

education_certification.credential: B.A./B.S. degree with a CPA License
